entry.title: Test Post, Please Ignore
entry.summary: Mic check. One, Two. Check Check. Is this thing on? (tap tap). “Ah, there we go.” This is the first post using a non-Wordpress CMS. I am going to check out a static blog generator called Publii. Hopefully there are no downsides. I do expect…
entry.content:
Mic check. One, Two. Check Check.

Is this thing on? (tap tap). “Ah, there we go.”

This is the first post using a non-Wordpress CMS. I am going to check out a static blog generator called Publii. Hopefully there are no downsides. I do expect that it will help me keep a simple blog that doesn’t require lots of maintenance and I can skip the frequent emails of people trying to spam my Wordpress posts. I don’t think I really need an actual PHP database for my purposes. Admittedly, my purposes are hazy and undefined.

Anyway, I think that is enough for now, time to hit Save and see what happens.

Now how do I turn this thing off…?
